summary: Provides a transpiler pass that implements the default unitary synthesis plugin, converting arbitrary unitary operators into quantum circuit representations by decomposing them into sequences of hardware‑compatible basis gates, handling parameter substitution, and synthesizing two‑qubit interactions using techniques such as KAK and Euler decompositions.
business_intent: Enable automatic compilation of high‑level unitary specifications into executable gate sequences tailored to the target quantum hardware, thereby supporting efficient execution of quantum algorithms on real devices.
